Ukraine, Russia accuse each other of early New Year's Day attacksUkraine's shelling of Donetsk killed four people, a Russian-installed official said, while Ukrainian officials said at least one person was killed in Russia's air attack on Odesa. Mon, 01 Jan 2024 01:04:44 GMT G7WKYMYDSBMDZE7P7JJ6KXVKRY https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ukraine- Russia-accuse-each-other-early-new-years-day-attacks-2024-01-01/Reuters世界欧洲
New Zealand says China's safeguard duties on milk powder overNew Zealand said on Monday all its dairy products were now able to enter China duty-free as safeguard duties on milk powder ended on Dec. 31, marking the removal of all remaining tariffs agreed upon in the free trade deal between the two countries. Mon, 01 Jan 2024 00:20:06 GMT INZUV4ZDYVOXZPETT52CDKR2CI https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/new-zealand-says-chinas-safeguard-duties-milk-powder-over-2024-01-01/Reuters世界亚太地区
North Korea's Kim says armed conflict becoming reality because of USNorth Korean leader Kim Jong Un told the country's military commanders the most powerful means must be mobilized to destroy the United States and South Korea if they choose military confrontation, state media reported on Monday. Mon, 01 Jan 2024 00:09:46 GMT LGQ3PH3YBVKEHDQFHLGMPLMZAY https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/north-koreas-kim-says-armed-conflict-becoming-reality-because-us-kcna-2024-01-01/Reuters世界亚太地区
Zelenskiy says Ukraine stronger as it moves toward year two of warZelenskiy made almost no direct reference to the situation on the front line, the limited success of Ukraine's counteroffensive or the difficulties in securing continued military and other aid from the U.S. and EU. North Korea Kim Jong Un, China's Xi exchange message vowing closer ties, Yonhap reportsNorth Korean leader Kim Jong Un and Chinese President Xi Jinping vowed to further develop relationship of cooperation between the two countries, in New Year messages exchanged on Monday, South Korea's Yonhap news reported citing the North's state radio. Macron says 2024, marked by Olympics, will be year of French pride and hopePresident Emmanuel Macron vowed on Sunday that 2024 will be the year of French pride and hope, marked by the Paris 2024 Olympic Summer Games and the reopening of the Notre Dame cathedral after a devastating fire in 2019. Pope Francis tells Rome to clean up its act before 2025 Holy YearPope Francis on Sunday said the city of Rome has to improve its basic services for residents and visitors before the start of the 2025 Holy Year that is expected to draw tens of millions of pilgrims. Denmark's Queen Margrethe II announces surprise abdication on live TVDenmark's Queen Margrethe II, Europe's longest-serving monarch, will abdicate on Jan. 14 after 52 years on the throne and will be succeeded by her eldest son Crown Prince Frederik, she announced on Sunday.
